00008 class ORL2551ScalersDecoder : public ORVBasicTreeDecoder
00009 {
00010   public:
00011     ORL2551ScalersDecoder() {}
00012     virtual ~ORL2551ScalersDecoder() {}
00013 
00014     virtual inline UInt_t CrateOf(UInt_t* record)
00015       { return (record[1] & 0x000f0000) >> 16; }
00016     virtual inline UInt_t CardOf(UInt_t* record)
00017       { return (record[1] & 0x0000001f); }
00018     virtual inline size_t NScalersOf(UInt_t* /*record*/)
00019       { return 12; }
00020     virtual inline UInt_t IthChannelOf(UInt_t* record, size_t i) 
00021       { return (record[2+i] & 0xf0000000) >> 28; }
00022     virtual inline UInt_t IthScalerOf(UInt_t* record, size_t i) 
00023       { return (record[2+i] & 0x00ffffff); }
00024 
00025     virtual std::string GetDataObjectPath() { return "L2551:Scalers"; }
00026 
00027     // for basic trees
00028     virtual size_t GetNPars() { return 4; }
00029     virtual std::string GetParName(size_t iPar);
00030     virtual size_t GetNRows(UInt_t* record) { return NScalersOf(record); }
00031     virtual UInt_t GetPar(UInt_t* record, size_t iPar, size_t iRow);
00032 };
